description: This is an HTML file implementing a database viewer web interface with embedded CSS and JavaScript for dynamic data loading and interaction.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables of a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data into an HTML table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for a cell, handling objects and long content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for better viewing.
